summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 4.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13082 lux) and cloud levels (up 342 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16448 lux), the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 540 m), and outside temperature (up 3.5°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 342.2m lower than yesterday, 539.5m lower than past week, 467.6m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 292m to 1476m and averaged 420.8m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, pleasant humidity levels and slight breezes. Drizzle or light rain possible, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
